file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastFormatter.format: FTP command "$6" by "$1"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 User name okay, need password"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Need account for login"
Logon "$1"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 User logged in, proceed"
Logon Failure "$1"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Restart marker reply"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Service ready in nnn minutes"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Data connection already open; transfer starting"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 File status okay; about to open data connection"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Command okay"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Command not implemented, superfluous at this site"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 System status, or system help reply"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Directory status"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 File status"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Help message"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 NAME system type"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Service ready for new user"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Service closing control connection"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Data connection open; no transfer in progress"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Closing data connection"

Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 User logged in, proceed"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Requested file action okay, completed"

Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Need account for login"

Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Connection closed; transfer aborted"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Requested file action not taken"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Requested action aborted: local error in processing"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Requested action not taken: Insufficient storage space in system"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Syntax error, command unrecognized"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Syntax error in parameters or arguments"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Command not implemented"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Bad sequence of commands"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Command not implemented for that parameter"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Not logged in"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Need account for storing files"
Cmd: "$6 $7", Bytes: $9, Response: "$8 Requested action not taken: File unavailable"
